verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G758>chief<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day, <S%G2532>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2258>watched<s%> <S%G3906><s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> which had the <S%G5203>dropsy<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they held their <S%G2270>peace<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1949>took<s%> him, and <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> let him <S%G630>go<s%>;

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> thou <S%G4160>makest<s%> a <S%G1403>feast<s%>, <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%>, the <S%G376>maimed<s%>, the <S%G5560>lame<s%>, the <S%G5185>blind<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> thou shalt <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> they <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G467>recompense<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4671>thou<s%> shalt be <S%G467>recompensed<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G1342>just<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, it is <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> thou hast <S%G2004>commanded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5117>room<s%>.
